message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper deals with the problem of estimating 3D human pose and shape from a single color image, which is a core problem in computer vision. 
- cs.GR (Graphics) is also likely as the paper uses a differentiable renderer to project the 3D mesh to the image, which is a common technique in computer graphics. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is likely as the paper proposes an end-to-end framework based on Convolutional Networks (ConvNets) and uses a parametric statistical body shape model (SMPL) to get detailed 3D mesh results. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is likely as the paper proposes an efficient and effective direct prediction method based on ConvNets, which is a common technique in AI. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is also likely as the paper deals with the problem of estimating 3D human pose and shape from a single color image, which is a core problem in multimedia analysis.
